text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump @tedlieu writes:

Dear @PressSec: That’s a ridiculously low number for our population of 330 million people. It’s 1%. The relevant number is tests per capita. Of the top 5 countries with highest #COVID19 infections, the US is ranked second last in tests per capita. Do better.
